Plot: Single father obsessed with murdering the hit&run driver who killed his only child, poses as a screenwriter to get close to an actress who was in the death car. He feels fully prepared to ...
Title: This Man Must Die
Writer: Nicholas Blake (novel), Claude Chabrol (dialogue), Claude Chabrol (screenplay), Paul Gégauff (dialogue), Paul Gégauff (screenplay)
Actors: Michel Duchaussoy, Caroline Cellier, Jean Yanne, Anouk Ferjac
